title: Fix some URLs from Microsoft/msbuild -> dotnet/msbuild
body:
Also changes some branches from master to main.

Note that it intentionally doesn't change references to Microsoft/msbuild/issues as there are just too many. We should probably do a bulk find/replace at some point just for the issues URLs.

Also I'm changing the string resource, not sure if I should change it for all languages? No idea how xlf works.

commit.message:
Fix some URLs from Microsoft/msbuild -> dotnet/msbuild

Also changes some branches from master to main.

nodes.body: I'd love to promote https://msbuildlog.com but this is a domain I own privately, so probably better to point to the company-owned and controlled resource such as https://aka.ms/msbuild/binlog.
